items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their fitness activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who sees their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with relevant data protection regulations

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow other profiles without mutual confirmation
User receives notifications for new friend requests and followers
non_functional: Friend/follow actions should be processed within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 connections per user without performance degradation

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core social features include activity sharing and friend/follower connections. Further clarification needed on gamification, challenges, or integration with external social networks.
